trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Glasgow
There were no other sightings in Glasgow on or around May 31st 1998
divs: Sighting Detailsthere was a bungie jump out side a pub in in auchinairn glasgow when i had finished school i was around 15 years old and me and my family and many other ppl wher at the jump it was a very nice summer that year and the sky was blue no clouds or at least none that i remember that piticular day it was still very light and as wee where out side the pub watching ppl do the bungie i looked away in another direction possible towards falkirk i saw this sphere like craft far in the sky it was small in size due to the distance and the movements of this was very paticular at first when i spoted it it was not moving in any direction then sudenly shoot stright up and came down on an angle and went the oposate direction similar to the number 4 then vanished it did not go out out of sight as watching a plain go out of sight it instantly vanished as for my feelings on this and what i thought this was the moment i saw it well it obvious i knew exactly what it was without a doubt it was alien i was exited and as soon as it disapered i was looking around me for other ppl who may have been looking in that direction hopeing that they seen it but did not so i was quiet about it for years until i got the internet and started reserching on it and i found out that a small town called denny close to falkirk the direction i was looking has masses of sighting reports this confirmed what i already beleved 100% in and now i am convinced that there are to many conspirices for them all to be untrue thanks for letting me share this with you john wilson from glasgow scotland
